source: TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_SEQ_00<tab>Anogg won't be kept from the secrets of the ruins a moment longer.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_SEQ_00<tab>機械遺跡の坑道のアノッグは、興奮しているようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_SEQ_01<tab>You speak with Anogg, who rushes off to chase the “key” that 2P bade you recover before you can get so much as a word in edgeways. At this point, there is little for you or Konogg to do but follow.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_SEQ_01<tab>アノッグと話した。複製サレタ工場廃墟にいる「アノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_SEQ_02<tab>Catching up to Anogg deeper within the ruins, Konogg attempts to dissuade her from rushing headlong into danger at 2P's behest, making the rather astute observation that you hardly know her and you definitely do <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> know her true intentions. Anogg, however, refuses to consider that he may have a point, and insists upon cooperation with the android, believing it to be the most expedient means of making even greater discoveries. It seems that you have no choice but to pick a side.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_SEQ_02<tab>アノッグと話した。今後の方針について、双子の意見が分かれたようだ。ふたりの話を聞いて、どちらに賛同するべきかを考えよう。

TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_ANOGG_000_001準備はできたか？
ワタシはもう待ちきれん！
早く遺跡へと向かうぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_KONOGG_000_005<tab>There's no stopping her now. So much for preparation.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_KONOGG_000_005アノッグは言い出したらきかないですからね。
こういうときは好きにさせるしかありません。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_ANOGG_000_050<tab>Just think─machines equal to man! No, perhaps even greater! If we can find the key, we can figure out how they work! We can fix 2P, and then...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_ANOGG_000_050アンドロイド……なんて素晴らしい……。
アンドロイドは、人類を超える存在かもしれない……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_KONOGG_000_051<tab>...And what? Slow down and use your head! How are we to know that any of what she said was true?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_KONOGG_000_051姉さん、ちょっとは疑うことを覚えたらどうだい？
いつも後先考えず首を突っ込んで……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_ANOGG_000_052<tab>Oh, so you'd have us sit on our hands instead of pursuing the untold power that sleeps in these ruins? Twiddle our thumbs while others race ahead and claim the prize?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_ANOGG_000_052<tab>ムム……なんだ弟よ、ワタシの意見に賛成できないというのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_KONOGG_000_053<tab>I'm as intrigued as you are! But I would <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> have us put our blind faith in someone we've only just met─particularly someone making such wild claims. Were we to bring this “key” to her, there's no telling what she might do with it...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_KONOGG_000_053調査は必要だと思うけど、すべての情報を、
あのアンドロイドに渡すのは賛成できないな……だって……
彼女の言い分が正しいかどうかも、わからないじゃないか。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_ANOGG_000_054<tab>Hmph. If you want to be a coward, be my guest. I'll be boldly forging a path forward as, if you recall, we planned to do. And if we can secure 2P's continued assistance, all the better.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_ANOGG_000_054ふん……よろしい。
では今回の調査は別行動だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_ANOGG_000_055<tab>What about you? You can either dive into the great unknown with me, or stick in one toe at a time like a beardless baby.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_ANOGG_000_055旅の者よ、キミはワタシかコノッグか、
どちらの意見に賛同する？
賛同する方についてきてくれたまえ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_KONOGG_000_060<tab>Sometimes I hate being the reasonable one.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA003_03719_KONOGG_000_060アノッグは夢中になると、
周りが見えなくなることがあります……。
まったく……。
